name: refine
body:
# Welcome to Refine!

## Our services
English editing and proofreading for journal publication.

### Proofreaders
Our proofreaders are native language speakers with a vast amount of experience translating and reviewing English documents.

### Support
Once you have accepted our proposal to work with us, you will have complete access to our site services and can continue working with us on your original manuscript.  This will be provided for up to one year.

### Quote
You can get detailed information based upon your requirements by simply filling out this simple [form](/quote).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
